intro: Psychotria psilogyne, commonly known as the "blue psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking blue-violet flowers, which are typically arranged in clusters. Its leaves are usually elliptical and have a smooth texture. Psychotria psilogyne is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
